page.title: 14TAG GAMES
page.content: {Sticky Glue Sticky glue starts off with everybody holding hands in a circle.The person who is going to try to catch everyone (On it),says "I went to the shop and bought some sticky ,sticky substance" (e.g.chocolate or treacle or sausages) He makes a long list of sticky things, at the end of which he says"sticky, sticky glue".Atthe word "Glue"he runs after the other players.When he catches someone,that person has to stand still and hold out his arms and wait until he is freed by someone going under his arms.If someone is caught three times,he is on it and the game is restarted.
